review_text: Supernova Al is a very good choice for many English-learners in India, especially for spoken English, and particularly if you prefer learning with support in your native language. If I were to give it a rating, I'd call it something like "solid-to-very-good" based on the evidence. If you choose to try it, I'd recommend you treat it as a tool use it regularly (daily or near-daily), actively speak/practise, and try to apply what you learn (in real conversations, with friends, or at work)

If you choose to try it, I'd recommended you treat it as a tool use it regularly, actively speak/practice, and try to apply what you learn.

I decided to learn to speak English as part of my job, and I chose the Super Nova AI app for that. The "Practice a Conversation" feature has been very beneficial for me. Through this feature, any ordinary person can speak error-free conversations that are needed in daily life. This feature helps us speak English confidently by correcting even our small mistakes. If anyone spends a little time practicing daily, they can speak English well using Super Nova AI.

Very, very disappointed with this app! I downloaded it because the name and ads made it look like a simple spoken English learning app, but the moment I logged in (only possible with a mobile number), it asked a few details and then immediately showed a screen asking for ₹9 for just 3 days of “premium.” After that, they charge even more. If the main spoken English lessons are paid, at least be honest about it in the ads. Don’t promote it as a spoken English app as you give it with premium only.

Supernova AI can be easily acessed at any time. The AI technology will help you to learn English in more funny and interesting way.  If you use this app for learning English definitely this app will help you to practice English in a very systematic way. Highly recommend this app, and surely you can go for it.

The Supernova app has truly revolutionized how I learn English. From the moment I started using it, I was impressed by its comprehensive approach to language learning. The AI chatting feature, in particular, stands out as a game-changer. It feels like having a personal English tutor available 24/7, ready to engage in conversations on various topics. This interactive experience has significantly boosted my confidence in speaking English, and I no longer hesitate to express my thoughts.

Super Nova is Super...👌👌👌 I recently started using Supernova AI English Tutor, and it is truly awesome. The activities are very interactive and engaging, which makes learning English enjoyable and stress-free. My favorite feature is the activity-based practice. It helps me think, write, and speak more confidently in English. The step-by-step guidance and instant feedback make learning easy and effective. Supernova AI feels like a personal tutor that understands my learning needs and motivati

Super Nova AI is a highly useful English study app for learners at all levels. The lessons are simple, clear, and easy to understand, making it perfect for beginners. The app’s AI-based explanations, grammar practice, and speaking exercises help improve confidence quickly. Its interactive style keeps learning interesting, and daily practice sessions make it easy to build strong English habits. Overall, it's a very effective and user-friendly app for improving English skills.

“I really enjoy learning with the Suparnova AI English Speaking App. It helps me practice very well, and the lessons are clear and simple. With regular practice on this app, I am sure I will become more confident and fluent in English. It is truly a very helpful learning tool.”

​"I had a wonderful experience with the Supernova English App. It is one of the best platforms for anyone who wants to improve their spoken English skills. The mentorship program is excellent; the trainers are very supportive and help you correct your mistakes without any judgment. The syllabus is practical and easy to follow, which really helped me build my confidence. I highly recommend this app to anyone struggling to speak English fluently."

Supernova is an English learning app, likely designed to help users improve their English language skills through interactive lessons, exercises, and possibly games. It might offer features like vocabulary building, grammar guides, speaking practice, and progress tracking.Supernova is an AI-powered English learning app that's pretty popular, especially in India!

I restarted the app but no luck and from the WhatsApp service also not working 😕 If this is case I want my subscription amount back or fix this ASAP

Supernova AI is a solid choice for boosting spoken English fluency, particularly for Indian learners, often supporting native languages. Its 24/7 AI practice, instant corrections, and real-world role-plays build confidence, especially reducing speaking anxiety. Users praise its convenience and effectiveness, likening it to a personal AI tutor. A great tool for regular, active practice.

The AI tutor is not able to analyse audios of more than 2 minutes. It's a limitation of the app. Otherwise the app is okay. This limitation is a huge one because if our conversation exceeds 2minutes, AI will say "all correct good job" without giving feedback on that audio.

The Supernova English Tutorial app is an excellent learning companion for anyone looking to improve their English skills. The lessons are well-structured, easy to follow, and suitable for all levels. I especially love the interactive exercises and clear explanations that make learning enjoyable. The app’s user-friendly interface and regular updates show real commitment to quality. Overall, it’s one of the best English learning apps I’ve used—highly recommended!
